articles.description: Transfer updates on Harry Kane and Moises Caicedo, countdown to start of Premier League season and England's Women's World Cup quarter-final.
articles.title: Kane, Caicedo latest, Lionesses & Premier League countdown

articles.description: Liverpool agree a British record transfer fee of £111m with Brighton for Ecuador midfielder Moises Caicedo.
articles.title: Liverpool agree £111m fee with Brighton for Caicedo

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane is set to have a medical at Bayern Munich after being given permission to travel to Germany by Tottenham.
articles.title: Tottenham's Kane to have Bayern medical

articles.description: Sweden produce a magnificent performance to book a semi-final date with Spain and end Japan's dreams of winning the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Sweden beat Japan to book semi-final with Spain

articles.description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer is not expecting Newcastle to repeat their top-four finish from last season, but feels Manchester City are still the team to beat at the top.
articles.title: 'Newcastle need another miracle this season'

articles.description: Watch highlights as Sweden produce an excellent display to beat Japan 2-1 to book their place in the Women's World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Sweden beat Japan to progress to World Cup semis

articles.description: Watch live coverage from the ninth day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: England striker Alessia Russo takes advice from her "idol" David Beckham to embrace her first Women's World Cup experience.
articles.title: England's Russo takes advice from 'idol' Beckham

articles.description: Off the pitch, few teams at this World Cup have been as dysfunctional and wracked by controversy as Spain. Yet on the field, few have produced such impressive performances and possess such remarkable talent.
articles.title: 'It's a great day for Spanish women’s football'

articles.description: Listen to commentary of the second round of the Women’s Open at Walton Heath, Surrey.
articles.title: Listen: Women's Open - second round
